subject: recovery
description_text:
Hello there,

I own a set of the non upgraded Pro Plus Pedal set and I need a recovery
file as they are not working at the moment, while I was trying to update to
version v1.8.0 to make them compatible with the new Simsonn Manager 2.1.0.
Can you help me with that please ?

conversations.body_text: Hi Justin Groh,  Please check the purchase date of your Pro Plus and confirm that the version is 1.7.1. If so, you can manually update the firmware via SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0.      Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Select Pedals → Choose the file plus.sfu to upgrade.       https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Hello,

I ordered the pedals on 16.07.2024 so there a bit older.

> Am 09.08.2025 um 16:25 schrieb service@simsonn.com:
> 
> ﻿
> Hi Justin Groh,
> 
> Please check the purchase date of your Pro Plus and confirm that the version is 1.7.1. If so, you can manually update the firmware via SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0. 
> 
> Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Select Pedals → Choose the file plus.sfu to upgrade. 
> 
> https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
> 
> 
>
Hi Justin Groh,   You can try upgrading according to my suggestion first.

I already tried that I need to flash the Control Box, because it's already
in Simsonn flasher mode. I linked you a video under this EMail maybe
that'll help .



Am 10.08.2025 um 05:01 schrieb service@simsonn.com:

﻿
Hi Justin Groh,

You can try upgrading according to my suggestion first.




Attachment(s) that exceed the 20 MB limit have been dropped. Please reach out to the sender.
Hi Justin Groh,    Please send it to me via Google Drive. Files over 20MB are automatically deleted by the system, so I can’t see the attachment now.

try that one it's much better and has less data

Hi Justin Groh,  Please install the Todesk software. No registration is required — if prompted to register, simply click the close button in the top right corner. Then provide the ID and temporary password, and I can assist you remotely to resolve this issue now.      https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

I have actually figured it out its working again! Thanks for your assistance. Kind Regards Justin Am 10.08.2025 um 15:02 schrieb service@simsonn.com: ﻿
